mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.company_name, c.address, c.email, c.region_code_name, c.member_count, c.intro FROM companys c WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO companys(company_name, address, email, company_number, region_code_name, intro, years, member_count, created) VALUES(#{companyName},#{address}, #{email}, #{companyNumber}, #{regionCodeName}, #{intro}, #{years}, #{memberCount}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE companys set company_name= #{companysName}, adress= #{address}, email=#{email}, region_code_name=#{regionCodeName}, member_count=#{memberCount} where id=#{id}
